metadata.Title: CVE-2023-26242 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: afu_mmio_region_get_by_offset in drivers/fpga/dfl-afu-region.c in the Linux kernel through 6.1.12 has an integer overflow.

notes.Note: sbeattie> based on feedback in the patchwork submission, this may be a invalid issue

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
